name: 2D Platformer Tutorial (Javi_villegas)
description:
My Goal for my Final version of the 2D platformer will be to:

- Make a 3rd new level

- Add a new music Track that I made to the 2nd and 3rd levels.

- Make new Sprites to apply to either the player Sprite or enemy Sprites.

Credits: 

Created By: Javier Villegas
